description:
When a nobleman recognizes Sabo in the streets, Luffy and Ace learn the painful secret of their friend`s past. As a sign of solidarity, the three boys pledge to become pirates, and hoist a toast to brotherhood!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Itsuka Umi e! Sannin no Akudou Chikai no Sakazuki!
To the Sea Someday! The Pledge of the Three Brats!
Un jour, nous prendrons la mer ! La coupe de la fraternité des trois monstres
Однажды мы выйдем в море! Клятва трёх ребят на вине!
いつか海へ! 三人の悪童ちかいの盃[さかずき]!
